events.message: The insured has filed a claim following a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as the incident involved a vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and processing of the case.
The insured has been sent an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request sent for the police report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimates to support the auto accident claim.
The insured has provided all requested documents, including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has commenced with the assigned claims investigator.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault in the auto accident and the claim is valid.
A settlement offer based on vehicle repairs and associated costs has been proposed to the insured.
The insured responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with claim handling.
The claim has been approved following the insured's agreement to the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the insuredâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after payment issuance and customer confirmation.
All documentation and correspondence related to the auto accident claim have been archived for record keeping.
